gym_ghost_010_receptionist_02:
Let me register you as a challenger. Your name is
[VAR TRNAME(0000)], yes?
gym_ghost_010_receptionist_03:
Great! Now, in order to face Gym Leader Ryme,
you’ll first need to pass the Gym Test.
gym_ghost_010_receptionist_04:
Here at the Montenevera Gym, that means
warming up the audience for the main event!\r
That’s right—you’re the [VAR COLOR(0006)]opening act[VAR COLOR(0000)]!
gym_ghost_010_receptionist_05:
Your job is to get up on the stage, show us some
dead fierce Pokémon battles, and get the crowd\r
excited before the Gym Leader’s concert begins!
gym_ghost_010_receptionist_06:
You can start the Gym Test by speaking with
MC Sledge in front of the stage outside.
gym_ghost_010_receptionist_07: Now get out there and have fun!
